attributes.action: help keep Cranford School's Sports Facilities open to the Community
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Cranford School are planning to stop public use of their sports hall & other sports faciliities. 

This means that the Sports Hall, Gym, Squash Courts and Outdoor all weather pitches will no longer be available to 
the surrounding community members.

Cranford School sports facilities have been used as a hub of community cohesion for many years, enabling the young and old to take pride in their area.

The School Governers are meeting on Monday the 11th of Feb 2008 to make a decision. If they decide to go ahead, it will close at the end of March 2008.

Please help us in a bid to persuade the School Governers committee to keep this essential Community facility open for public use.

Help Us SUPPORT the campaign to keep these sports facilities open to the Community !!!!
